description.p: Get the difference in months between two datetime values.

prototypes.prototype: MonthsBetweenDateTimes as N (DateTime1 as T, DateTime2 as T)

description.p: Returns the difference in months between two datetime values.

discussion.p: The MonthsBetweenDateTimes function computes the difference in months between two datetime values.

example.caption: MonthsBetweenDateTimes() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 OrderDate, ShippedDate, MonthsBetweenDateTimes(OrderDate, ShippedDate) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =08/04/1994 12:00:00 00 am|09/04/1994 12:00:00 00 am|1
